t: old fashioned dry starch to mix with water for bulk fabric starching sewing discussion topic @ PatternReview.com
s: Peal Starch This seems to be a new product (2007), so not so old fashioned. However, it's formulated to be added to the rinse cycle in your washing machine. No perfumes or dyes, if that's important to you. I don't see this product on Amazon; not sure why they don't sell it that way.

t: Amazon
s: USE DIRECTLY IN YOUR WASHER: Unlike ... Peal Starch can be used directly in your washing machine. No mixing necessary, simply add the dry instant powder directly into your washing machine rinse cycle to starch any load of fabric. Then simply throw in the dryer for a crisp feel and professional finish. Small Business This product is from a small business brand...
